document.full_text: world's top phone maker nokia will pay its ceo stephen elop more than $6 million in one-time payments for moving to the finnish company from microsoft last september, a corporate filing showed on friday.
document.title: nokia pays elop over $6 million to move from microsoft
lines_and_colors: world's top phone maker nokia will pay its ceo stephen elop more than $6 million in one-time payments for moving to the finnish company from microsoft last september, a corporate filing showed on friday.
